subject: The Sound Of Silence
text:
Everything lies in silence
Maybe you and me
Just like a beautiful spring
Listening to the sound of silence.

All the time used to noise
We think this is very nice
But let me tell you my friend
Everything lies in silence
From the beginning to the end.

In the very beginning of this world
Everything was resting in the silence
In the end of this world again
There would be nothing in the world
Other than the sound of silence.
